doc.title: OTA

value.content: Over The Air (OTA) refers to automatic updating of software on connected devices from a central server. All device owners receiving a given set of updates are on the same "channel", and each device often can access several channels (e.g. for production or engineering builds).

value.title: See also
value.content: • Over-the-air programming on Wikipedia
